entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning and ending near noon then 40 percent chance of rain showers early this afternoon. Clearing late this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023
